title: Teach Me Daddy
description: MADDOXThere's a reason why I have a reputation.But if I do this, my past could go away.I have to take little Cora’s virginity.Spoil her from the good little girl into a naughty vixen that begs for Daddy so good.I have to teach her to be a good slut, but only for me.And then, I have to let her go, and never look back.CORAHe’s my teacher.I shouldn’t be attracted to him – he’s intent on humiliating me in class and making me kneel in private.I should hate Maddox.Should see him for the handsome, inked monster that he is.But I can’t stay away. Can’t stop myself from begging…Teach me, Daddy.A full-length dark romance novel. Teacher/student theme. Standalone, no cliffhanger, no cheating. HEA guaranteed.
author: Isabella Starling
